verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:1
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt hearken diligently unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to observe and to do all his commandments which I command thee this day, that the Lord thy God will set thee on high above all nations of the earth:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:2
verses.text: And all these blessings shall come on thee, and overtake thee, if thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the Lord thy God.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:3
verses.text: Blessed shalt thou be in the city, and blessed shalt thou be in the field.
